Quickstrike:




"No," Quickstrike replied to Stingtra. He shuddered, shaking his head 
lightly and flickering his red eyes after she called him cutey. It felt 
weird, but he didn't respond to it strongly.

He transformed to his robot mode and walked to the outside of the cave. He 
leaned against the side of the rock formation. He crossed his arms, and 
stared out. So this was their base? He really didn't like this situation. He 
was going to be on edge too much, maybe that was why he was being so surly 
to the females. He really didn't like yelling at them. They were nice bots.

He looked back. Their gang needed a flier.

He had a strike of an idea. He knew Rowdy Wolf would know how to help them. 
He had rather good protection of his own cave in the high mountains.

"Hey Scorponok, where's boss-bot?"

>have something for me to help you with, cutey. *Stingtra walks over and
>grabs an apple* Stingtra: Want anything to eat?

>"Ah'm

>now.

>go

>it

>their
> > lives because someone wanted to go out exploring.
